text: Samsung Galaxy A16 and Samsung Galaxy A16 5G are Android mid-range smartphones developed by Samsung. They currently runs Android 14 with One UI 6.1. They were announced on October 7, 2024. They were released on October 25, 2024. They has 4GB, 6GB and 8GB RAM. 128GB/256GB storage options. ==Specifications== ===Hardware=== ====Camera==== They has a 50MP wide back camera, 5MP ultrawide back camera and 2MP macro back camera and 13MP front camera. ====Chipset==== Samsung Galaxy A16 and A16 5G has either Mediatek Dimensity 6300 (6 nm), and Samsung Galaxy A16 5G had Exynos 1330 (5 nm) depending on region. ====Battery and Charger==== They has a 5000mAh battery capacity and 25W fast charging supported. ====Display==== They has a Super AMOLED Display and 90hz refresh rate, Samsung Galaxy A16 and A16 5G has a screen size 6.7 inches. ====Memory==== Samsung Galaxy A16 and A16 5G has a 128GB/256GB storage which has UFS 2.2 storage type and has 4GB/6GB/8GB RAM depending on region and microSDXC SD card slot. ===Software=== Samsung Galaxy A16 and A16 5G using a Android 14 and One UI 6.1 operating systems, they can upgrades up to six android operating systems. ==References== ==Other websites== *Samsung Galaxy A16 5G *Samsung Galaxy A16 Category:Samsung Galaxy A-series Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2024 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras
title: Samsung Galaxy A16
